# xclusiveCars

> Professional car import service from USA and Canada to Bulgaria

## About

xclusiveCars is a Bulgarian company specializing in importing vehicles from American auto auctions (Copart, IAAI) and delivering them to customers in Bulgaria. We handle the entire process: selection, bidding, purchase, shipping, customs clearance, and delivery.

## Services

- Car selection from USA/Canada auctions (Copart, IAAI)
- Bidding and purchase assistance
- International shipping to Bulgaria
- Customs clearance and registration
- Door-to-door delivery
- Full documentation support

## Website Sections

- `/` - Homepage with featured cars and services overview
- `/available-cars` - Ready-to-buy cars already in Bulgaria
- `/auction-cars` - Cars available at US auctions with price estimates
- `/auction-cars/[slug]` - Individual auction car details with countdown to sale

## Contact

Website: https://cars.weblateweb.dev
